query.name: page
query.description: The page to query, page should > 0 and < the total pages, default value is 1 if this parameter is null.

query.name: transfer_order_id
query.description: Transfer order Id on the ISV side, length <= 32

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/wallet/giftcode/query')
request.add_api_parameter("page", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("transfer_order_id", "test001")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/wallet/giftcode/query')
request.add_api_param('page', '1')
request.add_api_param('transfer_order_id', 'test001')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: records
schema.description: The list of gift codes, need to finish unmask verification firstly.

schema.name: total_page
schema.description: The total page number of the code list

schema.name: current_page
schema.description: The current queried page of the code list

schema.name: page_size
schema.description: The default max number of codes contained in one page.

schema.name: transfer_order_id
schema.description: Transfer order Id on the ISV side, length <= 32

schema.name: total_number
schema.description: The amount of created gift code, precise to two decimal places

schema.name: create_status
schema.description: The create status of the gift code
